DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study understand effect drug alprazolam ( Xanax ) anxiety . To understand effect anxiety-relieving drug fear anxiety , researcher often participant anticipate unpleasant stimulus . Anticipating unpleasant stimulus increase potentiate simple reflex call startle reflex . The so-called fear-potentiated startle reflex ( FPS ) effect may block reduce anxiety-relieving drug . Evidence suggest FPS mediate two mechanism regulate phasic- sustain enhancement startle . This study elicit phasic sustain FPS participant anticipate moderately painful stimulus administer predictably unpredictably . The main goal study ass affect alprazolam phasic sustain enhancement startle . This study comprise two pilot experiment main study . Participants study screen psychiatric history , physical examination , electrocardiogram ( EKG ) , blood urine test . Participants four test session separate 5 10 day . At session , participant give one two dos alprazolam , diphenhydramine , placebo ( inactive pill ) . Questionnaires test perform .
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : Recent breakthrough biomedical research improve ability identify successful pharmacological treatment derive novel candidate compound . This partly due inability exist scientific approach translate candidate anxiolytic identify drug discovery process efficient psychopharmacological treatment patient . A new drug development approach urgently need implement improve predictability efficiency translate basic science explosion validate drug target . A key approach improve selection candidate anxiolytic clinical trial fill gap animal model clinical study patient implement test healthy human predictive validity subsequent clinical efficacy . As step towards goal , develop integrative experimental model fear anxiety non-clinical subject . We use model identify anxiolytic anxiogenic property various compound . The current specific objective 1 ) test psychopharmacological validity model use recognize anxiolytic ( SSRI citalopram ) , 2 ) test property compound hypothesize anxiolytic anxiogenic ( e.g. , oxytocin , arginine vasopressin , hydrocortisone ) 3 ) examine time course anxiolytic effect benzodiazepine alprazolam FPS . Study population : Medically psychiatrically healthy male female age 18 45 . Design : The study examines fear anxiety elicit unpleasant electric shock deliver predictably unpredictably , respectively . The following drug test : 1 ) Citalopram , 2 ) oxytocin arginine vasopressin , 3 ) hydrocortisone , 4 ) alprazolam . Outcome measure : The primary outcome measure startle reflex . Secondary measure include skin conductance response , heart rate , subjective measure anxiety .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Subjects healthy volunteer 1845 year old free current psychopathology organic central nervous system disorder . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Any significant medical neurological problem ( e.g . cardiovascular illness , respiratory illness , neurologic illness , seizure , etc . ) Adverse reaction cortisol ( cortisol study ) Adverse reaction benzodiazepine antihistamine ( alprazolam study ) History angioedema Osteoporosis ( Hydrocortisone study ) High low blood pressure History fainting First degree relative history mania , schizophrenia , psychoses A history mania , schizophrenia , psychoses Current migraine Use herbal medicine dietary supplement psychoactive property ( citalopram study ) Any current psychiatric disorder Past alcohol/drug dependence alcohol/drug abuse past one year Current use psychotropic medication Impaired hearing Pregnancy Breastfeeding currently take contraceptive hormone ( oxytocin/vasopressin study ) Positive result betahuman chorionic gonadotropin testing ( female ) Neurological syndrome wrist ( e.g. , carpal tunnel syndrome )
